name: Soup Quest (Ben Leaver)
description:
Soup Quest is a game made for the Paint Jam 2021 - All art was made in Paint.

The aim of the game is to collect all the soup cans and exit each level. You will have to explore and use your platforming skills  to traverse each level. There are 6 total levels and 32 total soup cans to collect. Can you collect them all?
